nodes.text: The Stevedores' Guild was an organization that controlled all cargo in and out of a spaceport during the Imperial Era. The only thing that impressed the Guild was an individual's ability to pilot a Bantha-II cargo skiff through the organized chaos of a packed loading.
In order to exploit a lucrative business opportunity, a group of spacers impressed the Guild by racing against guild members in a Bantha-II cargo skiff race.

The Stevedores' Guild was first mentioned in an adventure hook in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders. This article assumes that players successfully complete the hook as described.
